### emitOpcodePrefix() {#a0380d1619a4fdac78ae5bfa7f2b68832}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>PrefixKind X86MCCodeEmitter::emitOpcodePrefix (int MemOperand, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; char &gt; &amp; CB) const</>}>

<ParametersList title="Parameters">

</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the used prefix (REX or None).
</SectionUser>

### emitSegmentOverridePrefix() {#a5ab5979a635c31462c9e9f398d862d34}

<MemberDefinition
